name: Coconut Tag
description: This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam Week 189 where the theme was small island. In this game, you are playing tag with your coconut friend, and you have to avoid him for a certain amount of time. Note that he will get faster over time. Use the arrow keys or WASD to move around. I think the game fits the theme because you are on a small island. The font is Inika Bold and made by Constanza Artigas Preller. Feedback on the game would be appreciated! NOTE: if you are playing the web version, do not press the quit button.
